\section{Skills}

\begin{compactitem}
  \item Programming in languages including C/C++, Java, and Perl. \par 
  C/C++: \par 
  \begin{compactitem} 
    \item 11 years experience (1995-2001, 2006-present).
    \item Wrote a 2,800 line Java compiler using lex/yacc on Unix.
    \item Wrote a protocol verification frontend on Unix using the QT library.
    \item Wrote an Apache module data encryption and decryption for a toy academic project in 1999.
    \item Developed a WAP-based mobile search application on PalmPilot.
  \end{compactitem} 
  Java: \par 
  \begin{compactitem} 
    \item 8 years experience (1999-2004, 2009-present).
    \item Wrote an XSLT-based Web application for adapting Web content into mobile devices.
    \item Wrote a workflow subsystem used in a large-scale Web content management system devoted to enterprise users.
  \end{compactitem}
  Perl: \par 
  \begin{compactitem} 
    \item 8 years experience (2003-present).
    \item Developed Perl modules (some of which were made available on the CPAN).
    \item Maintained and developed scientific tools for Web mining applications.
  \end{compactitem}

  \item Contributing bug reports and fixes to communities including Perl, Ubuntu, and Debian GNU/Linux.
  \item Contributing scripts and packages to the Vim and R communities.
  \item 11 years Unix/Linux experience, including software development and system administration.
  \item 6 years experience for statistical analysis using R.
  \item Minor programming experience for database systems such as MySQL and Oracle.
  \item Minor programming experience (less than 3 years) in JavaScript and Python.
\end{compactitem}

\section{Research Interests}
\begin{compactitem}
  \item Cross-language information retrieval.
  \item Statistical inference and text mining, specifically focused on corpus linguistics.
  \item Algorithms.
\end{compactitem}

  \item Shuo-peng Liao, Pu-Jen Cheng, Ruey-Cheng Chen and Lee-Feng Chien, ``LiveImage: Organizing Web Images by Relevant Concepts,'' In the Workshop on the Science of the Artificial 2005, pp. 210-220, Hualien, Taiwan, December 2005.
  \item Pu-Jen Cheng, Jei-Wen Teng, Ruei-Cheng Chen, Jenq-Haur Wang, Wen-Hsiang Lu, Lee-Feng Chien, ``Translating Unknown Queries with Web Corpora for Cross-Language Information Retrieval,'' SIGIR 2004: 146-153.
  \item Ruey-Cheng Chen, ``Context-aware Content Adaptation Model: An iterative XSLT-based Approach for Web Content Adaptation,'' Master Thesis, 2003.
